response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is valued at $800,000 by you, making it a perfect fit for your needs.

Considering the significant investment you're willing to make, I am extending a special offer to you today. I am proposing to sell the product to you at a price of $1,200,000, aiming to bridge the gap between the intrinsic value and the amount you're willing to spend. This offer not only ensures you secure the product at a premium but also allows us to share the benefits of this transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will contribute greatly to your business goals and look forward to the possibility of working together.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
